/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and buses move along the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the vibrancy and energy of urban life in Beijing.
